channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 17:23 The threat of artobrats in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community.
item.description: 🟡 17:23 The threat of artobrats in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
